distances.sparse

Class SparseCombinedMetric

  • java.lang.Object
    • distances.primary.CombinedMetric
      • distances.sparse.SparseCombinedMetric
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class SparseCombinedMetric
extends CombinedMetric
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class implements the functionality for combining different parts of the distances computed on sparse parts of the data representation.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
